Class DrawingPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • DrawingPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class DrawingPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.print.Printable
    Trida DrawingPanel kresli barevnou mapu s vrstevnicemi, mapa reaguje na kliknuti leveho tlacitka mysi, v miste kliknuti zobtazi bod a jeho nadmorskou vysku
    Version:
    2.0 (10-05-2021)
    Author:
    Lukas Runt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DrawingPanel()
      Urcuje pocetecni velikost okna, tak aby mela sirku alespon 800px a alespon vysku 600px, pritom zachovava pomer stran
